definition: an index of the cost of all goods and services to a typical consumer

positive_examples: This is an example of consumer price index.
The consumer price index demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed consumer price index in this context.
A typical case of consumer price index would involve these features.
The concept of consumer price index applies here.
A measure that tracks changes in the prices of a basket of goods and services commonly purchased by consumers.
negative_examples: This is an example of inflation, not consumer price index.
This represents economic indicator in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Inflation, or other types of EconomicIndicator
